name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pocket Buddy - Money Saving Chrome Extension

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Money Saving Chrome Extension for Online Shopping that finds the best cashback & discount offers on your payment cards.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pocket Buddy - Maximize your Credit Card Points

Pocket Buddy is a Money Saving Chrome Extension that helps you get the most Credit Card Points and Rewards while shopping online.

Pocket Buddy is the only extension you will ever need for getting maximum credit or debit card rewards and points. Card companies and online merchants routinely run campaigns to help customers get more points and rewards for their shopping. Pocket Buddy actively curates these campaigns and helps you maximize credit points by recommending the best payment method for each online shopping store.

All you need to do is select your credit and debit cards from a list within the extension and let Pocket Buddy do its magic! It‚Äôs fast, safe, and automatic. No Signup or Card credentials are required.


‚úÖ Find your best payment option on 350+ Online Stores!

Get most of your shopping by getting maximum credit and debit card points and rewards. Pocket Buddy will go through all the payment options you have added and suggest the best one to use. This gets you the lowest price on your online purchases.

Pocket Buddy works perfectly on 350+ leading shopping websites, including Amazon, Flipkart, Apple, Walmart, Target, and Myntra.

Our exhaustive database includes offers and discounts from almost every major bank and payment method, including JPMorgan Chase, Bank of America, Goldman Sachs, HSBC, Standard Chartered, HDFC, ICICI and SBI.

ü™Ñ Earn most Reward Points

You don‚Äôt have to go through a barrage of options to find your best credit card that returns maximum reward points! Let Pocket Buddy do its magic next time you visit a shopping website. 

üíØ Shop with confidence

Pocket Buddy‚Äôs intelligent search engine scours the internet for all the card and merchant campaigns on your available payment options. It will then recommend your best debit or credit card to get maximum points and rewards.

 You will never have to worry about overpaying while you shop, ever!

üòç No signup. Free forever!

Pocket Buddy will never ask you to sign up to get all its wonderful features. We value our users and would never ask you to share anything above the bare minimum to maximize your shopping experience. Pocket Buddy is also completely free to use.

üí≥ No Card Credentials are needed

Pocket Buddy only needs the name of your cards for it to work. The extension will never ask you to type in your credit or debit card number or other sensitive information.

‚ö°Here‚Äôs how Pocket Buddy works:

Install the Pocket Buddy chrome extension
Click on the Pocket Buddy extension icon on your browser toolbar. This initiates the setup process. Sign-up is not required.
On the next page, choose all applicable banks you have an account with or those you regularly use to make online payments.
Now select all the payment methods available for each of these financial services. You can add or remove payment options later on.
That‚Äôs it! Pocket Buddy is now ready to get you more card points.

Pocket Buddy will list all the reward campaigns on your cards on supported online stores to help you get more credit points.

What are you waiting for? Add Pocket Buddy money-saving extension to your chrome browser today and start paying less for more!
